id.description: The unique identifier of the note.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the note was created.

body.description: The content or text of the note.

id.description: The unique identifier of the user who created the note.

first_name.description: The first name of the user who created the note.

last_name.description: The last name of the user who created the note.

name.description: The full name of the user who created the note.

employee_id.description: The employee ID of the user who created the note.

private.description: Indicates if the note is private or not.

visiblity.description: The visibility settings of the note.

visibility.description: The visibility settings of the note.

id.description: The unique identifier of the email.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the email was created.

subject.description: The subject or topic of the email.

body.description: The content or body of the email.

to.description: The email address of the recipient.

from.description: The email address of the sender.

cc.description: The list of email addresses in the CC field.

id.description: The unique identifier of the user who sent the email.

first_name.description: The first name of the user who sent the email.

last_name.description: The last name of the user who sent the email.

name.description: The full name of the user who sent the email.

employee_id.description: The employee ID of the user who sent the email.

id.description: The unique identifier of the activity.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the activity was created.

subject.description: The subject or topic of the activity.

body.description: The content or description of the activity.

id.description: The unique identifier of the user performing the activity.

first_name.description: The first name of the user performing the activity.

last_name.description: The last name of the user performing the activity.

name.description: The full name of the user performing the activity.

employee_id.description: The employee ID of the user performing the activity.
